description: This Java class 'AttributeReportingConfig' models the configuration for attribute reporting in a Zigbee or similar device SDK, containing attribute info and reporting interval parameters.

classes.name: AttributeReportingConfig
classes.description: A Java class representing the configuration for attribute reporting, including attribute info, minimum and maximum reporting intervals, and reportable change.

methods.name: getInfo
methods.description: Returns the AttributeInfo object associated with this reporting configuration.

methods.name: setInfo
methods.description: Sets the AttributeInfo object for this reporting configuration.

methods.name: getMinInterval
methods.description: Returns the minimum reporting interval in seconds.

methods.name: getMaxInterval
methods.description: Returns the maximum reporting interval in seconds.
